err.msg: illegal vector range specification at line %d\n
err.doc: The bounds specified for a bussed signal are not numerical values.
An external connector with the same name has already been declared in the module.
A net with the same name has already been declared in the module.

err.msg: net '%s' used out of declared range at line %d\n
err.doc: A bit a range of bits is refered to for the given net despite being beyond the bounds specified in the net declaration.

err.msg: width or/and type mismatch at line %d\n
err.doc: A port connection in an instantiation does not match the port specification of the module being instantiated.

err.msg: escaped vector '%s' not declared in strict bit ascending/descending order at line %d\n
err.doc: Only occurs if avtStructuralVerilogVector is set to yes. Escaped vectors declared as individual bits can be handled correctly only if the bits are declared in a strict ascending or descending order without any gaps.

err.msg: escaped vector '%s' not declared with all bits together at line %d\n
err.doc: Only occurs if avtStructuralVerilogVector is set to yes. Escaped vectors declared as individual bits can be handled correctly only if the bits are declared together.

err.msg: Missing external connector for external signal '%s' driving verilog netlist '%s'\n
err.doc: Occurs when driving an incoherent verilog netlist.

err.msg: Cannot open file to drive verilog netlist '%s'\n
err.doc: File I/O error, check disk space and privileges.
